name: Replace››all
description:
Sometimes you have lots of text that repeats, and it's not part of a component/instance system. When you want to simply and easily replace the contents of each of those, you can quickly grab Replace››all to help you!


There's three main ways to replace something:

  1. Type text into the Find input, type replacement text in the Replace input and press "Find & Replace" (or hit enter) to replace everything that matches
  2. Select a single item to fill the Find input with that text value, type replacement text in the Replace input and press "Find & Replace" (or hit enter) to replace everything that matches
  3. Highlight multiple items, type a value in the Replace input and press "Replace only" (or hit enter) to replace everything within your current selection
